levels.description: Blows out an airflow towards the 3 frontal tiles; Operators deployed <@ba.vup>downstream</>/<@ba.vdown>upstream</> from the airflow have <@ba.vup>increased</>/<@ba.vdown>decreased</> ATK; Enemies moving <@ba.vdown>downstream</>/<@ba.vup>upstream</> from the airflow have <@ba.vdown>increased</>/<@ba.vup>decreased</> Movement Speed
